div.head: 蟲蛇傷
div.div: injury caused by bugs/worms and snakes

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: injury caused by bugs/worms and snakes

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with chong shang 蟲傷 , harm caused by bugs/worms. Ri hua zi zhu jia ben cao 日華子諸家本草 Substance Entry wu lan 吳藍：解毒藥、毒箭，金瘡，血悶，蟲蛇傷 , “It dissolves the poisonof pharmaceutical drugs, the poison of arrows, [heals] wounds inflicted by metal objects, blood heart-pressure, and injury caused by bugs/worms and snakes ”.
